statements: SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type, value, timestamp FROM sensor_data;
SELECT * FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_type = 'temperature';
SELECT sensor_id, timestamp, value FROM sensor_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM sensor_data WHERE value > 100 ORDER BY value ASC, timestamp DESC;
SELECT AVG(value) AS avg_value FROM sensor_data;
SELECT * FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_type='temperature' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type FROM sensor_data WHERE value > 1000 ORDER BY sensor_id ASC;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type, value FROM sensor_data WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY value DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, AVG(value) AS avg_value FROM sensor_data GROUP BY sensor_type HAVING AVG(value) > 500;
SELECT DISTINCT sensor_id FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_type IN ('humidity', 'pressure') ORDER BY sensor_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM Sensors;
SELECT sensor_id, location, sensor_type FROM Sensors WHERE location ='Room A';
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type, installation_date FROM Sensors ORDER BY installation_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM SensorData WHERE value > 50 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT sensor_id, COUNT(data_id) AS total_data FROM SensorData GROUP BY sensor_id HAVING total_data > 100;
SELECT sensor_id, location, sensor_type, installation_date FROM Sensors WHERE location = 'Room A' ORDER BY installation_date DESC
SELECT * FROM Sensors WHERE sensor_type = 'Temperature Sensor' AND location = 'Lab B'
SELECT sensor_id, AVG(value) AS average_value FROM SensorData GROUP BY sensor_id HAVING AVG(value) > 50
SELECT DISTINCT location FROM Sensors ORDER BY location ASC
SELECT sensor_id, timestamp, value FROM SensorData WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-01-31' ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT * FROM SensorData;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name FROM SensorData WHERE timestamp > NOW() - INTERVAL '1 day';
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name, data->'temperature' AS temperature FROM SensorData WHERE sensor_name LIKE 'Temp%';
SELECT sensor_id, location FROM SensorLocation WHERE location = 'Room A';
SELECT sensor_id, metric_name, metric_value FROM SensorMetrics ORDER BY metric_value DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name, timestamp, data FROM SensorData WHERE sensor_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name, timestamp, data FROM SensorData WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01'
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name, timestamp, data FROM SensorData WHERE sensor_name = 'Temperature Sensor' ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT sensor_id, location FROM SensorLocation INNER JOIN SensorData ON SensorLocation.sensor_id = SensorData.sensor_id
SELECT sensor_id, metric_name, metric_value FROM SensorMetrics WHERE metric_value > 5 ORDER BY metric_value DESC
SELECT * FROM sensors_data;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type FROM sensors_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, location, latitude, longitude FROM sensor_locations WHERE latitude > 0;
SELECT * FROM sensor_errors WHERE sensor_id = 1;
SELECT SUM(data_value) AS total_data FROM sensors_data;
SELECT * FROM sensors_data ORDER BY sensor_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type, timestamp, data_value FROM sensors_data WHERE sensor_type='temperature';
SELECT sensor_id, location, latitude, longitude FROM sensor_locations WHERE latitude < 0;
SELECT sensor_id, timestamp, error_message FROM sensor_errors WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT sensor_id, timestamp, alert_type FROM sensor_alerts WHERE alert_type='critical' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM SensorData;
SELECT sensor_name, timestamp, value FROM SensorData;
SELECT sensor_name, value, timestamp FROM SensorData WHERE value > 100;
SELECT sensor_id, data_type, timestamp FROM SensorData ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM SensorEvents WHERE event_type = 'maintenance';
SELECT * FROM SensorData WHERE sensor_id = 1;
SELECT sensor_name, value FROM SensorData WHERE data_type = 'temperature';
SELECT sensor_id, data_type, timestamp FROM SensorData ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, MAX(value), MIN(value) FROM SensorData GROUP BY sensor_id;
SELECT sensor_id, AVG(value) AS average_value FROM SensorData WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' GROUP BY sensor_id;
